body_html:
@apaszke, I made stride a tuple() and no longer accept torch.LongStorages as sizes from the Python side.

I ended up combining the relevant parts of the LongArgsPlugin with THPlugin. I couldn't figure out any other way to do the type-checks for THSize* correctly, because only one plugin can provide a type-check.

I ended up combining the relevant parts of the LongArgsPlugin with THPlugin. I couldn't figure out any other way to do the type-checks for THSize* correctly, because only one plugin can provide a type-check.
body:
@apaszke, I made stride a tuple() and no longer accept torch.LongStorages as sizes from the Python side.

I ended up combining the relevant parts of the LongArgsPlugin with THPlugin. I couldn't figure out any other way to do the type-checks for THSize\* correctly, because only one plugin can provide a type-check.
